v-model:show.description: Whether or not to display the menu

strategy.description_zh: 菜单定位方式，可选值为 absolute fixed

offset-x.description: The x-axis offset, relative to the position of the menu alignment
offset-x.description_zh: x 轴偏移量， 相对于菜单对齐后的位置

offset-y.description: Y-axis offset, relative to the position of the menu alignment
offset-y.description_zh: y 轴偏移量， 相对于菜单对齐后的位置

teleport.description: The location where the menu is mounted

trigger.description: The menu trigger mode can be 'click' hover, 'click' is triggered when clicked, and 'hover' is triggered on hover
trigger.description_zh: 菜单触发方式，可选值为 `click` hover, `click` 为点击时触发, `hover` 为悬停时触发

reference.description: A trigger element selector associated with a menu that specifies a specific child element of the menu as the trigger element
reference.description_zh: 菜单关联的触发元素选择器，用于指定菜单的特定子元素为触发元素

elevation.description: Altitude, with selectable values of 'true', 'false' and '0-24'
elevation.description_zh: 海拔高度，可选值为 `true` `false` 和 `0-24` 的等级

same-width.description: Whether it is the same width as the triggering element

default-style.description: Whether to enable the default style

popover-class.description: The class of the pop-up layer

close-on-click-reference.description: Whether to close the menu after clicking on the menu to trigger the element
close-on-click-reference.description_zh: 是否在点击菜单触发元素后关闭菜单

methods.name: resize
methods.description: Menu By default, this method can be called to redraw when a slot element changes its position size
methods.description_zh: Menu 默认插槽元素产生位置大小变化时可以调用此方法进行重绘

$Placement.name: `cover-top`
$Placement.description: 顶部中心位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-top-start`
$Placement.description: 顶部左侧位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-top-end`
$Placement.description: 顶部右侧位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-bottom`
$Placement.description: 底部中心位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-bottom-start`
$Placement.description: 底部左侧位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-bottom-end`
$Placement.description: 底部右侧位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-left`
$Placement.description: 左侧位置, 覆盖触发器

$Placement.name: `cover-right`
$Placement.description: 右侧位置, 覆盖触发器

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the menu is opened

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggers when the opening menu animation ends
events.params: 打开菜单动画结束时触发
events.description_zh: 打开菜单动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the menu is closed

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggers when the close menu animation ends
events.params: 关闭菜单动画结束时触发
events.description_zh: 关闭菜单动画结束时触发

events.name: click-outside
events.description: Triggered when you tap outside the menu
